name: Spooky Pumpkin Drop
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Space bar to jump
WASD keys to move
LEFT Click to Dash

Collect as much candy as possible in 2 modes: Classic or Adventure mode

Classic mode has the platforms get faster the longer time goes on.
Adventure mode allows you to collect candy at your own pace.


This was just a quick version to get out for to showcase some of my work from early 2022 learning game development.

Known issues:

Buttons in pause menu do not work

Volume adjustment in main menu does not work

Gameplay music loops even when going back to the main menu. 

UI buttons not covering all words.

Music loop repetitive
